transcript: I think Twitter is the single greatest tool for learning how to write the forces you to have work incision and you get immediate feedback I usually wake up with like three or four Tweets in my head and I won't even get out of bed until I put them in I'm tweeting to myself and that's what people don't get my tweets are me trying to bang myself in the head and be like dude be patient or like you don't need to care about this person's opinion they're so violent because I'm in the moment of discomfort and I write that to myself to get over the moment and move on with my dad
